properties.name: jforex.system.url
properties.description: JNLP URL for the Dukascopy JForex platform to connect to.

properties.name: jforex.system.username
properties.description: Username for the trading account.

properties.name: jforex.system.password
properties.description: Password for the trading account.

properties.name: jforex.system.reconnects
properties.description: Number of times to attempt reconnection to the trading platform.

properties.name: jforex.system.auto-reconnect
properties.description: Whether to try to automatically re-connect to the Trading platform.

properties.name: jforex.system.trades-enabled
properties.description: Whether trading opportunities are acted upon, or only logged.

properties.name: jforex.system.take-profit
properties.description: Number of pips to set the take-profit at.

properties.name: jforex.system.stop-loss
properties.description: Number of pips to set the stop-loss at.

properties.name: jforex.system.ema-delta
properties.description: The EMA 50/100 delta threshold at which an order position becomes too risky to open.

properties.name: jforex.system.ema-slope-threshold
properties.description: The slope threshold that determines a 'steep' or 'strong' slope.

properties.name: jforex.system.enable-auto-migitation
properties.description: Whether to enable losing order detection and loss mitigation.

properties.name: jforex.system.strategy-mode
properties.description: How aggressive or conservative to run the strategy.

properties.name: jforex.system.back-test.enabled
properties.description: Whether the system use back-testing instead of live-testing.

properties.name: jforex.system.back-test.start
properties.description: Start date for back-testing, must be in the past, in format YYYY-MM-DD.

properties.name: jforex.system.back-test.start-time
properties.description: Start time of day for back-testing, in format hh:mm:ss.nanosecond am.

properties.name: jforex.system.back-test.end-time
properties.description: End time of day for back-testing, in format hh:mm:ss.nanosecond am.

properties.name: jforex.system.back-test.duration-days
properties.description: The number of days' worth of data to run the back-test with.

properties.name: jforex.system.back-test.duration-minutes
properties.description: The number of minutes' worth of data to run the back-test with.

properties.name: tednology.system.connect-on-startup
properties.description: Whether to connect to the Trading platform on system start-up.

properties.name: tednology.system.strategy-window-open
properties.description: The beginning of the daily time window at which the strategy should be running (e.g. 10:00 AM).

properties.name: tednology.system.strategy-window-close
properties.description: The end of the daily time window at which the strategy should be running (e.g. 5:00 PM).

properties.name: tednology.system.contact-emails
properties.description: List of contact emails to send notifications to.
